long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This enhancement for Simpro adds additional features and functionality designed to improve upon Simpro's job management software.

This is a paid for enhancement, with the following features:

• Cost Centre column on Job/Stock Take List
• Zone Filter on Alerts
• Show/Hide zero values toggle on Stock Takes
• Select All button on Remove Service Levels
• Create Single Job in Maintenance Planner
• Add multiple primary contacts on Forms
• Add secondary contractor contact on Forms
• Convert to Job on Asset Failure
• Remove Decline button on Job Card
• Change interface colour on multi-company builds
• Assign teams in Tasks
• Create Direct Debits and collect automated payments (via GoCardless)
• CalcWizard functionality for calculating costs for printing/manufacturing
• Create separate jobs in Maintenance Planner for each service level
• Record reason for Job price changes
• and much more.....

More features are continuously being added to enhanced businesses use of Simpro Premium.

Note: This enhancement is not supported by Simpro directly.
